name: A Place For Rest
description:
This is my entry for the o2a2 2022 jam this year. 

"A Place to Rest" is an atmospheric ghost story. Illustrated without a protagonist, exploring the themes of eternal life from a different perspective. I let the environment tell the story mostly. In the same way that some of my favorite horror games do. I often contemplate possessions that have been left behind, I hope it brings that same feeling to you too. 

Thank you for playing.
